Summary: two triangle shape objects flying low one behind other
divs: Sighting Detailsi was driving home from washing cloths i turned on kirk road from meridian road i was headed up kirk when i got to the hill i noticed a light on right through the trees as i came on hill it came from behind trees then i noticed another light behind it as i got closer i seen both objects flying low one behind other triangle shaped no noise nothing they flew over the road over big lots parking lot then over building and keep going as i was watching it my girlfriend called she was on her way back from her moms headed home she to seen them as soon as i answered the phone she says where you at theres to triangles flying on kirk road that she followed them into biglots parking lot and lost them.ive seen planes been in military seen stealth fighters commercial planes these ive never seen before.december of this year we also witnessed a cross shaped ufo on shenley and kirk road while moveing to are new place i was out my car right under thing it was unlike anything ive ever seen.iam convinced something is going on in this area and someone needs to say something 3 weeks ago during the day time i counted 13 fighter jets in the sky flying around.
